{"id":556919927,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1631966285,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"93 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/556919927/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.3 MB","code":"/*\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n--||author : codechaser||-- \n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n*/\n\nclass Solution\n{\npublic:\n    ListNode *addTwoNumbers(ListNode *l1, ListNode *l2)\n    {\n        ListNode sum{0};\n        auto curr = &sum;\n        int carry = 0;\n        while (l1 || l2 || carry)\n        {\n            int a = l1 ? l1->val : 0;\n            int b = l2 ? l2->val : 0;\n            curr->next = new ListNode((carry + a + b) % 10);\n            carry = (carry + a + b) / 10;\n            l1 = l1 ? l1->next : nullptr;\n            l2 = l2 ? l2->next : nullptr;\n            curr = curr->next;\n        }\n        return sum.next;\n    }\n};\n/*\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n    |||   https://codeforces.com/profile/codechaser   |||\n    |||   https://www.codechef.com/users/codechaser   |||\n    |||        https://github.com/code-chaser         |||\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
